name: Pac-Man
description: A port of Pac-Man for FM7.

name: Miku Chan's Robot
description: Earth is on the brink of destruction, but Miku-chan's robot is ready for duty! Or is it ready?

name: Pac-Man
description: A Pac-Man port for Sharp X1.

name: Pac-Man
description: A port for Sharp MZ-2200

name: Pac-Man
description: A port of Pac-Man for old mobile phones.

name: XVM
description: A game released exclusively inside the Disk NG 1 bundle.

name: Temporal Odyssey
description: Temporal Odyssey: Journey Through Time is an enigmatic adventure game that invites players into a mysterious journey across different epochs. Guiding the character Aylin, players will embark on unique explorations in various time periods, solving intricate puzzles and wielding the power to alter the fabric of time itself. The game delves beyond mere time travel, challenging players to shape the past and change the course of the future. Temporal Odyssey not only encompasses the thrill of temporal exploration but also encourages players to unravel the secrets of time, rewrite history, and craft their own epic temporal saga. Immerse yourself in this captivating experience that reveals time travel as an unpredictable and surprise-laden adventure.

name: Trans Liberation Forever
description: Sin descripción

name: Pac-Man 2600
description:
This is a "new" version of Pac-Man for Atari 2600 I've been programming since about 2007, but had left in 2008, then in 2013 I resume again to try to finish.

I've been trying to make it as close to the original looking at various sites on the "AI" Ghosts, game logic, etc.

This version has nothing to do with the other version called pacman4k, this is a completely new version, do not use any undocumented opcode.

Currently the rom is about 120 bytes free, so I'm trying to add other things.

name: Atari Retro Handheld Console
description:
A dedicated handheld with 50 Atari 2600 games.

List of games:

3D Tic-Tac-Toe (31 in 1)
Adventure
Air-Sea Battle
Asteroids
Black Jack
Bowling
Breakout
Canyon Bomber
Casino
Centipede
Circus Atari
Crystal Castles
Demons to Diamonds
Desert Falcon
Dodge 'em
Double Dunk
Fun With Numbers
Golf
Gravitar
Haunted House
Home Run
Human Cannonball
Maze Craze
Millipede

Missile Command
Night Driver
Off the Wall
Pong - Video Olympics
Quadrun
Radar Lock
Realsports Football
Realsports Tennis
Realsports Volleyball
Sprintmaster
Star Raiders
Steeplechase
Stellar Track
Street Racer
Submarine Commander
Super Baseball
Super Breakout
Swordquest: Earthworld
Swordquest: Fireworld
Swordquest: Waterworld
Tempest
Video Checkers
Video Chess
Video Pinball
Yar's Revenge

name: Gorf the Ghost Saves Halloween
description: You are Gorf the Ghost. It's Halloween but everyone is too scared to trick or treat because of an evil skeleton in the graveyard. Explore the town, help your friends, and save Halloween!

name: 8 Ball Pool Classic
description: Get your chalk out, grab a pool cue and get ready to play a game of 8 ball pool. Pot balls of your colour group in any order, into any pocket with the black ball potted last to win the game.

name: Bird Vs Bird
description: Trapped! The evil birds are looking to trap you in their net of vines. You must use your wits to outsmart them in this puzzle game. Once you're done, play as the evil birds too as you try to trap the helpless red bird within the net to win!

name: The Bowling Tournament
description: Enjoy a completely new way to bowl. Try to make all the pins fall and compete against other players.

name: Chess
description: Enjoy a completely new way to bowl. Try to make all the pins fall and compete against other players.

name: Exact
description: Ricochet your way to victory as you light up the screen with enchanting colors. Score EXACTLY what’s needed by bouncing off the coloured “Scoring objects”. Avoid obstacles, activate triggers and manipulate your speed in this physics puzzler!

name: Eye2Eye
description: The lonely eyes are missing their mates. Draw a path between two eyes of the same color, while filling up the entire grid. Bring all the eyes together in the least possible attempts, as you try to score three stars in every level.

name: Fish Fighter
description: Get ready to eat, or be eaten! Venture into the spectacular ocean and eat as many fish as you can in this aquatic adventure. Eat the required number of fish to progress through the levels. If you like sea food, you're in for a treat!

name: FooFee
description: Foo and Fee are stranded on an uninhabited planet and they need your help! Help them work together by controlling their jump to survive the treacherous obstacles that block their path in this endless survival game.

name: Pixiel: Dreadwager
description: Pixiel Dreadwager is a rogue-lite shooter set in the Pixygon universe, where you'll explore the Dark Forest alongside a lone robot named Pixiel from Amebrak! Your task is to annihilate hordes of enemies using collected skills and later confront legendary creatures residing in the forest!

name: BioFury
description: An intense first person shooter that honors classics like Wolfenstein and Doom by bringing you 12 levels of non-stop action.

name: Missland 2
description: Sin descripción

name: Nightmare Nursery
description: An old-school retro stylised horror where you play as an urban explorer called Elizabeth, who has been intrigued by rumours regarding an abandoned nursery, with claims of hauntings and disappearances, now hidden by towering trees, left to be nothing but a forgotten memory in the public's eye.

name: Outlanders: Home is Where the Heart is
description: After receiving a letter from an estranged family member, a rookie Leader will journey through the tricky swamps of the Outlands while tracking the steps of his ancestors.

name: Narava RPG
description: Explore a magical open world crafted by a passionate developer. Battle using weapon skills or magic and evolve your character throughout your adventure.

name: Infinite Forest Idle
description: A true idle RPG with roguelite and multiplayer elements. Made for playing (on a second screen) while doing something else.

name: Futanari Tales
description: There are girls with a twist here! Let's get weird.

name: Scream or Die
description: Horror game.

name: Bloodshots
description: Immerse yourself in a terrifying survival horror experience set in a laboratory where horrific experiments have been conducted. Take on the role of Joseph Alexander Blackwell, who has to rescue his daughter. To succeed, you will be forced to use your own blood in unusual and twisted ways.

name: Famine Way
description: Famine Way is a 2D adventure game in the author's hand-drawn style, which unfolds Holodomor in 1932-1933. Go on a journey, experiencing all the tragedy through the eyes of little Olena and her companion - a wounded stork!

name: Coloring Pixels: Advent 5 Pack
description: This Advent-themed book unlocks 24 additional levels for Coloring Pixels!Play during the month of December to get the full Advent experience! 1 image will unlock every day between the 1st and the 24th like a true Advent calendar!

name: Fruit Strike!
description: Aim high in this juicy game as you try to strike clusters of fruit and break them up before they pile up into a fruity heap!

name: Desolate City: Last Show
description: It's the last concert of his tour, and Don Aitor will have to survive the horror. Discover the consequences of the strange virus threatening the pixelated city of Gray Bay in this survival horror/action RPG.

name: King of Throwing
description: Author’s suggestion: Use a notepad to record the angles of your throws. Players can aim and throw by clicking the left mouse button, and control the character’s left and right movement by pressing A and D. Control the angle of your throw, you don't want to make a mistake

name: Twista
description: The Hardest Game in the World! (I guess.)

name: Gravitwist
description: Jump over pools of boiling lava and avoid spikes to complete each level – all the while walking across walls and ceilings.

name: Ericanskinsmonsters
description: Join Ericanskinsmonsters and her band of misfits as they embark on a dangerous undertaking to save the realm of Strifestav from a cruel necromancer and his army of undead at any cost. Nothing will stand between you and your vengeance in this classic style turn based rpg!

name: Stealth Assault: Urban Strike
description: Great shooting game, prevent the insurgency crysis on the planet! We will see you on the frontline!

name: Hidden Object Hunt
description: Find objects hidden across the screen from the list provided. Spot all the objects as quickly as you can in an extremely competitive multiplayer mode that will take you through a host of familiar settings to explore!

name: Atomic Titans: Light Violence
description: Embark on a cosmic journey with Atomic Titans: Light Violence, an action-packed casual combat game. Engage in heart-pounding showdowns within the confines of space faring arenas.

name: The Death Focal
description: The death focal(TDF) is a first-person shooting game where you have to prove yourself worthy in mini-battles in order to be qualified for the incoming great battle .

name: The Spellswapper
description: The Spellswapper is an arcade roguelite where you use spells to defeat waves of enemies. Command an ever-moving arsenal of spells. Swap out old spells for new ones after each wave, crafting a unique magical repertoire in every run.

name: Kings Call
description: Kings call is a free-to-play, trading-card based MMO . Playable through a browser, the game allows players to take the role of the Lord of Silver Heron Ridge

name: Soldier Yōki
description: Soldier Yōki, is an indie, action, and third-person shooter game. Solo or in cooperation, up to 4 players, explore the different settings, with diverse gaming experiences. Face the Extraterrestrial alliance and defeat the Boss in order to win the game.

name: Ling Hun
description: A 2D Platformer Game were Jumping is not affected by gravity (that's what happens when you got your soul stolen). Master the jump to succeed in every level. Enjoy the classic Pixel Art with a mix of Asian ink style in the Background. Change the pace of the game to adapt it to your gamestyle.

name: Eternity's Echo: Patient Zero
description: Eternity's Echo: Patient Zero takes place at a gas station in Winona, Arizona. Rayne Williams is a D.I.B Agent sent to investigate the strange occurrences at this gas station along Route 66. Join the story through Rayne's perspective as she tries to fulfill her mission amidst the challenges she encounters on the station's premises!

name: Champion Road
description: Champion Road immerses you in a dynamic fusion of classic beat 'em up intensity and entertaining platform challenges. Join six formidable fighters in a nostalgic 90s-style tournament arena. Unleash your skills, relive arcade gaming's golden era, and emerge as the ultimate champion!

name: Click Cricket
description: Click Cricket is a single player casual cricket simulation for PC. The simple but engaging gameplay makes each match is unique with its own set of challenges to overcome and ensure victory on the field!

name: Mr. Sanna Clozz
description: Candied blades, magical guns and tons of fun. Chestnut takes off on an adventure to save Christmas night!

name: ReHarmony
description: The main character finds themselves ensnared within a mysterious realm, and it's up to you to help them avoid getting lost in time. As our hero navigates different time periods, they must activate special keys to control the flow of time.

name: Corporate Pussy
description: Corporate pussy is an adult visual novel with point&click elements. Dive into the office life as a corporate worker, interact with hot colleagues and become the big boss.

name: Super Kawaii Ninja
description: Super kawaii ninja is a single player arena fps.

name: Chrysolite
description:
A strange knight sat in front of a fire, darkness surrounding him. His sword stuck in the ground, covered in dried blood. He warns you against going any further, but the intrigue of what lies beyond far surpasses the instinct of self preservation.

Play as a young thief and explore the dangerous ruins of a once-prosperous kingdom. Fight against hordes of terrifying monsters, make your way through challenging platforming sections and discover the secret that lies at the very bottom of the ruins in this handcrafted experience.

Chrysolite is a narrative driven, pixel-art, 2D platformer with Soulslike inspirations.

name: The Dragonhood
description: The Dragonhood is a clicker RPG with rougelite elements and automatic battles. Collect eggs, hatch dragons, and loot stuff on a variety of 1 vs 1 adventures or 3 vs 3 dungeons. Complete quests and build your dragons the way you want with various evolutions, abilities, amulets, and more!

name: Delta
description: Dynamic and colorful first-person battles with alien creatures, spectacular parkour, exploration of mysterious locations in the atmosphere of space science fiction. Become a ruthless killing machine and free Delta Station from the invasion.

name: Chutney: Space Survivor
description: Chutney: Space Survivor is a third person, hoard-shooting deck builder where you play as Chutney, shooting down hordes of enemies with his Omni-gun. Alter your attacks by collecting different cartridges and create unique synergies!

name: Twin Gods
description: Twin Gods is a turn-based JRPG. Join Nothik in his fight against a dying world on the orders of his missing father. Upgrade gear, open barrels, combo spells together, discover items, overcome your town bully, learn the world's ancient history, and battle a really confused turtle.

name: Starlight Legacy
description: Forge your own legacy in Starlight Legacy! Explore the vast Evaria Kingdom in beautiful 2D pixel art graphics, an exciting turn-based battle system, and a non-linear story.

name: A-Girl: New Character A
description: A new character！

name: Mortal Kombat 1: Tremor Kameo
description: Tremor, Ninja of the Black Dragon Clan, returns to the new Mortal Kombat Universe. Purchase this pack and receive Tremor as a Kameo Character to assist you in fight.

name: Mystery Box VR: Escape The Room
description: The VR version of the third chapter of the Mystery Box series. Can you crack crazy puzzles to open incredible boxes and escape the room you're trapped in?

name: Hue Drops
description: Feast your eyes on this vibrant and colourful puzzle game! Colour the entire board the shade of the target colour, and score combo bonuses.Use power-ups in challenging puzzles to complete all the levels before you run out of turns!

name: Octo-push
description: Octo-Sam is determined to circle the world! Help him on his journey by launching him through the air while occasionally latching on to gliders, planes and various other power-ups. Travel as far as you can in this addictive distance game.

name: Pic-Fix
description: Good at bringing order to chaos? Jump in and unravel the real picture from the scramble of pieces.

name: Pop Stop
description: The Mask of Magic is in your possession. The tribals are looking to steal it from you. Protect the mask at all costs while using hand-made weapons and special abilities. Shop for upgrades to improve your abilities as the tribals get stronger each wave.

name: Scuba Pop
description: Colorful bubbles are full of treasure! Aim and shoot to clear bubbles by matching colors and resurface with your loot!

name: Sid Meier's Civilization VI: Jinx Pack
description:
A mod that adds the Zaun civilization with its Leader Jinx.
Playing as her gives you:

- Unique building (Arsenal of Deadly Weapons)
- Unique agenda (The Loose Cannon)
- Adds civilization color schemes to the game
- And much more!
An unofficial version of 2048 for the Commodore 16.

name: Devil's Gambit
description:
Devil's Gambit follows Hector, a badger healer returning to the little town of Rannai, the birthplace of his fondest memories. He holds dearly his time with the mischievous yet friendly wolves, the stories they told, the fertile forest east of town, and the mist that heralded every sunrise. Most of all, he remembers Cadgan: a wolf a bit younger and smaller than himself — an unrepentant troublemaker who left in him a bundle of emotions.

But that was nine years ago, when he was just a teenager. Upon his return, Hector finds the town transformed by the new duke's reign, and a Cadgan that has grown into a cold, distant mountain of a man. As he works as a healer and reignites a long-forgotten passion, Hector notices something other than love in the air.

The trees' roots stir with his every step.

name: Olsenbanden Jr. I Vikingenes Fotspor
description: This time the history goes back to the viking age. A group of criminals kidnaps a history teacher (a viking expert), forcing him to show them the secret viking grave. Olsenbanden contacts their old teacher which leads them on an adventure where they have to stop the bad guys before they find the grave. In order to solve the mystery, the player have to go through 10 missions. For each successful mission, they will get closer to the finish line. As always, the Olsenbanden jr have both police and villains on their heels.

name: This Game is For You 2022
description: Hi there, welcome! This is a horror game I've made just for you.

name: Holy Maid Academy
description: When Ryunosuke Kokuto receives a personal invitation from the chairman of a respected edifice to serve as a professor there, he doesn’t say no to the opportunity.

name: My Girls’ Secrets
description: This is a "casual" game with beautiful painting style, go through the level and explore the mysterious world, in this world will meet all kinds of girls, in the face of their challenges you should make choices to make them succeed as your girlfriend.

name: Fairies Love
description: This is an elimination game with beautiful painting style, go through the level and meet six girls with different personalities, in the face of their challenges you should make choices to make them succeed as your girlfriend.

name: Hibernation
description: “Dormancy” is a unique survival game where players are summoned to a frozen dream. In this dormant realm, mysteries and challenges abound, and only by bravely confronting them can one hope to uncover the truth.

name: Frontline Battles
description: In this tug of war style strategy game you can send out soldiers to destroy your enemy's bases. Deploy army's comprised of multiple different types of soldiers that each fill a different role. Push across the map to your enemy's HQ and destroy it to win in these short less than 20 minute matches.

name: Newcomer: Intermediate Immersion
description: A fantasy language learning adventure for intermediate language learners. Practice and improve your ability to speak in your target language to save the the kingdom and befriend its people!

name: Thought Experiment Simulator
description: Trolley Problem, Ship of Theseus, Brain in a Vat, Infinite Monkey, Sisyphus, Prisoner Paradox, Schrodinger's Cat, etc.

name: Annihilator
description: A 3D Action-roguelike game,Use different item and weapon to Annihilate the intruders

name: Pineapple 2000
description: Pineapple 2000 is a remixed and revamped version of Space Invaders that pits a gingerbread man warrior against an army of invading Fruitoids.

name: The Ohio Weedeater Mishap
description: This parody of The Texas Chainsaw Massacre sees Leatherface replaced with a bumbling idiot from Ohio who can't start his weedeater leading to an accident.

name: Bar Stella Abyss
description: Bar Stella Abyss sees players take the role of a faceless wanderer who is drawn to Stella Abyss, a bar hidden in a mysterious corner of the city. Players will build a party and explore the dream-like Drunken World.

name: Dracula's Castle
description: Duke Nukem gets shot down by a Science experiment gone wrong near Dracula's Castle - get in and make the bastards pay for rising your flight insurance premium yet again.

name: Magdalene
description: Duke enters a city covered in gray clouds and quiet rains of autumn. Unfortunately, it seems that the alien scum don't respect this beautiful season. Note that this map can be pretty difficult. It also contains couple of silly traps and puzzles

name: Bacon Grease
description: Bacon Grease is a rather typical city map with particular attention payed to a grimy mood and a strong sense of place. You'll make your way through the streets of a besieged city, encountering a mix of commercial, residential, industrial, shopping, and transit locations.

name: Overdose Delusion
description: Duke got a job as watchman for a research unit on the freezing shores of northern Siberia. However, because of gross negligence and lots of alcohol, Duke locks himself out of his guardpost and loses the keycard. To make matters worse, aliens launch their attack on the station, so Duke is about to have a busy night.

name: Block Mind
description: A dream-like map that spans multiple environments. The premise is to transport yourself out of a hub area to different locations, solve the puzzles, return to the hub, and open up a forcefield.

name: Day of Night
description: Map takes place in nighttime. Duke has to roam through sewers, a subway station and city streets.

name: Memory of The Waters
description: Duke is lost in a snowy wilderness (probably because of alcohol). He stumbles heroicly around and discovers all sorts of eerie locations.

name: Null Moon
description: Duke is enjoying his holiday. He visits the secluded town of Whitehorne in snowbound Ontario - and just like that, his holiday is suddenly filled with work.

name: Promise
description: Christmas is at the door in snowy Allentown and Duke has promised to collect gifts for Lara. While doing so, he also needs to teach the aliens how one respects wintery holidays.

name: Reverse Will
description: Duke has arrived at Florida to investigate the SPCH facility.

name: Rolling Crash
description: Top down racing game in which the player collects dots Pac Man-style on several lanes while avoiding collisions with the other car.

name: Clay Shoot
description: The goal is the shoot clay targets which can appear in groups up to three targets at once.

name: Pocket Cuisine
description:
A pocket-sized puzzle game that combines the joy of cooking and the satisfaction of pleasing discerning customers! Just drag, drop and cook!

With more than a hundred levels to challenge, can you become the ultimate Pocket Chef?

name: Satoyama Note: Natsukusa Komichi
description: "Satoyama Note: Natsukusa Komichi" is a novel game about the creatures that live in satoyama. Collect illustrated books and take the quiz-style satoyama test. The background music is played live by a shinobue flute, and the world is depicted by hand-drawn ink paintings.

name: Bolt Action Stealth
description: Steady your aim. Silence is your cover. Exterminate from afar with realistic gun mechanics and long-range bullet physics in this suspenseful, first-person, alien-eradicating sniper puzzle game.

name: Dragon Front Rising
description: Challenge players online or solo with Conquest mode in this immersive collectible card-battler. Dragon Front Rising mixes high fantasy with World War II on a 4x4 grid battlefield that is alive with rampaging giants, intimidating war-machines, and soaring projectiles.

name: X8: Japan Only Version
description:
The next generation in Hero Shooters!

Executing its directive to assemble worthy opponents, the rogue mod X8 has collected characters from across different game franchises. Players embody a variety of heroes and engage in 5v5 VR battles to restore a path back to their worlds.

name: Big Ballers VR
description:
Go Big or Go Home.

Welcome to Big Ballers VR. Play basketball, football and much more. You will perform jaw-dropping contact dunks and compete with up to 10 players in epic showdowns of half court and full court gameplay. Rise to the top to become the #1 baller in online competitive while getting fit with realistic physics-based motion controls.

Enjoy private parks and tons of character customization. Master easy-to-learn dribbling mechanics and make friends in this immersive world.

name: Sp(l/r)ite
description: When you wake up, you are in a different space. "Sp(l/r)ite" is an adventure game in which you must cooperate with your neighbors and a vivacious goddess, separated by walls, to escape from a room floating in a different space, while solving riddles. Which door will you choose when you get there?

name: Rebirth Evolution: Casino Attendant Pack
description:
Casino Attendant Pack
Includes: Casino attendant hat, top, bottom, another bottom, yet another bottom, assassination dinner knife.

name: Filter World
description: Sin descripción

name: Jeff The Killer
description: Are you ready to be scared?

name: Death Front
description: Death Front is a first-person shooter with supernatural elements. Team up in parties of four to uncover the mystery behind a series of gruesome murders while being haunted by ghosts. Do you have what it takes to face these sinister forces?

name: Main Deity Space
description: The journey of endless slaughter and reincarnation, survive together with your companions.

name: Rebirth Evolution: Haunted Carnival Pack
description:
Haunted Carnival Pack
Includes: Haunted carnival hat, top, bottom, carnival backpack, terror park chainsaw.

name: Rebirth Evolution: Fierce Bear Pack
description:
Fierce Bear Pack
Includes: Fierce bear hat, top, bottom, bear's heavy machine gun.

name: Knight Versus Demon
description: In Knight Versus Demon a VR player controls a villainous demon battling against a tiny stoic hero played by a local friend on the PC.

name: Synthwave Runner
description: Synthwave Runner is a casual game where you have to jump over different obstacle to keep running and increase your highscore in an stunning synthwave style.

name: Pixel Game Maker Series: Storm Swordsman
description:
Stealth & swordsmanship & ninjutsu
An action adventure with an epic storyline.

name: Fortnite: The Final Reckoning Pack
description: Frighten your foes with outfits from one of the Island's darkest of tales, The Final Reckoning! Includes 3 Outfits and 3 Back Blings.

name: Rocket League: Painted Paragon Bundle
description: Sin descripción

name: Half-Life: 25th Anniversary Update
description:
To celebrate the 25th anniversary of the ground breaking FPS, Valve released this update (and will support it going forward). Included are:

Half-Life Uplink
4 New Multiplayer Maps: Contamination, Pool Party, Disposal, and Rocket Frenzy
Updated Graphics Support
Controller and Steam networking support
Steam Deck support

And much more!

name: Boxy Boy
description: The player controls the character "Rabi-Kun", and must push various crates over the yellow dots in order to complete the game's fifty-five stages (divided into five "worlds") in that stage's time limit. Rabi-Kun can only push the crates, and he cannot pull them; and should one of the crates reach an unmoveable position, the player may simply push the "reverse" button to undo one of the player's moves. Should Rabi-Kun be trapped in an area and cannot get out, the player must push the "reset" button on the control panel, however this will not reset the timer; and should that timer reach zero, the game will be immediately be over.

name: Five Nights at Freddy's Doom
description: This 1993 DOOM mod lets you visit Five Nights at Freddy's 1, FNaF 2, and FNaF 3 pizzerias.

name: LotR: Realms in Exile
description: A total overhaul mod for Crusader Kings III, based on the works of J.R.R. Tolkien's The Lord of the Rings.

name: D3ad Hand
description: D3ad Hand is a satirical graphic adventure inspired by LucasArts golden age videogames like Monkey Island and the Indiana Jones series.

name: Sid Meier's Civilization VI: Akbar Pack
description:
A mod that adds the Mughal civilization with its Leader Akbar.
Playing as him gives you:

- Unique units (Gajnal & Mansabdar Cavalry)
- Unique great person (Architect of Wonder)
- Unique building (Red Fort)
- And much more!

name: Marine Battle
description:
Marine Battle is an arcade shooter which pits your destroyer against a multitude of aerial and naval forces. Your ship can move back and forth across the top of the water, and can fire directly upwards at planes or downwards at submarines or the elusive ghost ship whose shadowy presence occasionally manifests itself at the bottom of the screen. Both planes and submarines may fire back at you, and the goal for a given level is to destroy a certain number of submarines before a timer runs out and while avoiding incoming fire.

Destroying a plane will cause its pilot to bail out into the water, and he may be collected for extra points. Your war ship also has a finite amount of ammunition, and a limit on the number of bombs/shots in the air at any one time. When ammo supply runs low, a resupply ship appears at the side of the screen allowing you to restock. Later levels increase the rate of fire of all of the enemies, and the game continues with increasing difficulty until you eventually lose all your lives.

name: Mole
description: Mole is a whack-a-mole type of game where the objective is to hit on the head of colored moles as they emerge from 8 holes situated in cardinal and ordinal directions from the center of the field. However, the color of the mallet changes frequently and the player has to respond to it because hitting a mole of the same color as the mallet will result in decrease of the score bar. If the player is unable to fill the score in time (indicated by a timer bar), the game is lost. There are 9 difficulty levels, with higher difficulty featuring more frequent appearance of moles of the same color as the mallet, thus requiring more attention of the player.

name: Black Hole Interior Explorer
description:
Here's your chance to cross the event horizon and see what the inside of a black hole looks like.

Use WASD to control your magical laws-of-physics defying space-time vehicle. Move the mouse to look around.

name: Pill Box
description:
It's war, and you are a gunner in a fortified gun emplacement, or pillbox. Your position at the top of the screen is slowly being over-run by soldiers, who are creeping up on you from the bottom of the screen, and taking cover behind rows of sand-bags. Once the enemy gets past the final row, they will destroy your base with a grenade, so you will need to shoot them before that happens. You control the cross-hairs of a gun, and must take aim and fire at the soldiers when they are crawling between the sandbags, which is the only time they are exposed. Occasionally, the leader of the troops briefly appears at the bottom of the screen to encourage their troops. Shooting the leader will cause all of the remaining troops to surrender, and the next wave to begin.

The difficulty increases for the later waves, when the troops start crawling faster, and vehicles will sometimes appear which deliver soldiers closer to your pillbox.

name: Space Maze Attack
description: Space Maze Attack is a top-down shooter in which the player navigates a white spaceship in search of treasure through claustrophobic mazes that are infested with hostile aliens. The spacecraft is equipped with a simple peashooter and has limited energy. When the energy runs out, the spaceship explodes. Upon finding a treasure, the unused energy is converted to points and a new level starts. There is also a 2-player mode where two people can take turns in order to find out who can amass the highest score.

name: Super Doors
description: Sin descripción

name: Backbone's Rampage
description:
You play as the treacherous Backbone in his quest to spread villainy across a city full of super heroes, with splendid surprises awaiting you!
Made for the GMTK game jam 2023 in under 48 hours.

name: Curiosity Killed the Explorer
description: Sin descripción

name: You Are The Victim
description: Sin descripción

name: Suzumiya Haruhi no Chokuretsu: Chou SOS Dandanin Collection
description: Sin descripción

name: Radiant Victorias
description: With kindom Asira left in ruins, Wolf, the prince of Asira, embarks on a journey around the world where he teams up with eight heroines and tries to stop the empire's ambition.

name: Fight for Vengeance
description: Sin descripción

name: Calamity Mod: Infernum Mode
description:
An extension mod for Calamity that adds an extra difficulty - Infernum

This difficulty is harder than Death mode and can be activated with the difficulty selection UI in Calamity.
The primary focus of the mod is expansive reworking of boss AIs.

Some bosses gain extra phases for maximum "It's not over yet!" energy.

name: Five Nights at Freddy's: Help Wanted - Full Time Edition
description:
Five Nights at Freddy’s: Help Wanted - Full Time Edition is a combined version of the best selling Five Nights at Freddy’s: Help Wanted, and it’s DLC, Curse of Dreadbear EXCLUSIVELY for the PS5 & PSVR2. This new edition includes all content from the original Help Wanted, plus the Halloween DLC, Curse of Dreadbear, giving you over 50 scary-fun minigames in one terrifying package.

Face your fears in VR or Standard non-VR modes, and see if you’ve got what it takes to be an upstanding, committed member of the Fazbear team!

name: Frogger
description: An exclusive port of Frogger for the Atari Flashback series. It is based on the Atari 2600 architecture.

name: Space Invaders
description: A new port of Space Invaders released in Atari Flashback consoles. It is based on the Atari 2600 architecture.

name: Desert Falcon
description: The Atari 7800 port of Desert Falcon, a 3D (isometric) flying shooter game that was developed and published in 1987 by Atari.

name: Super Reaktor
description: Super reaKtor is a fast-paced Bullet Hell with original controls, where you must survive by collecting green energy pellets, and avoid or absorb various types of hostile TRI-SKL bullets.

name: Life on Earth: Reimagined
description: Sin descripción

name: Waifu Hell
description: Old school classics with the new twist.

name: Ms. Pac-Man
description: An enhanced port of Ms. Pac-Man, with additional content, released only in the Arcade Classics bundle, on the Philips CD-i.

name: Cleany's Window Service
description: You get a request from an unknown client. They need you to clean their windows during the night. Given the look of their luxurious home, you expect a big payout for your service.

name: MythWars & Puzzles
description: Welcome to MythWars & Puzzles. Immerse yourself in the fantasy world with magic and lore. You will take on the role of a mighty Lord that have been chosen to join an unprecedented war against the evil gods. It is time to construct your magical city, train a massive army and recruit legendary heroes. This very unique and attractive RPG game uses the classic match-3 puzzle to drive the power of the gods into your army as they charge into the enemies fearlessly, and get rid of all the evil.

name: Ms. Pac-Man
description: Like in the original Pac-Man, the goal of the game is to eat all of the dots in a maze while avoiding the four ghosts; if one of the ghosts catches Ms. Pac-Man, a life is lost and the game ends when the player has no more remaining lives. In each corner of the maze are power pellets; when Ms. Pac-Man eats one of these, the ghosts temporarily turn blue and are no longer a threat (the player can earn bonus points for eating ghosts while blue). On some sides of the screen are warp tunnels which transport the player to the opposite side of the screen; if a ghost follows through the tunnel they are unable to move as fast allowing the player to use them to escape. Once all of the dots in the maze have been eaten, the player continues to the next level. As the levels progress, the difficulty is increased by increasing the overall game speed and the duration the ghosts remain blue after eating a power pellet is shortened (eventually disappearing altogether).

name: Ms. Pac-Man
description: Sin descripción

name: Ms. Pac-Man
description: Pac-Man is in love! And what a star his sweetheart is, with her red ribbon and long eyelashes. Just like her leading man, Ms. Pac-Man chomps her way through mazes as she battles four ghosts. Round and round, back and forth, across the stage she races as she gobbles up dots, energy pills, teddy bears, fruit, and pretzels. Can she escape the marauding ghosts? Or will this be her final curtain? Will Pac-Man ever see his lady love again?

name: Travel Cat: Adventure Island
description: Build your farm island, Grow crops and animals, Explore the island, Mining for Gold and Minerals , Gather resources , Exchange furniture.

name: Half-Life: 25th Anniversary Adventure
description: LambdaGeneration's special browser based game for Half-Life's 25th Anniversary where you can find and learn all sorts of Half-Life facts and trivia

name: Aeruta
description: A bread revolution across the world now begins! Aeruta is a side-scrolling action game with a shop management twist, fight monsters for materials and use them to make breads, then finally make the deserted town popular again!

name: Solitaire Classic
description: Indulge yourself in a classic game of Solitaire! Keep your eye on the clock as you try to arrange the cards in sequence. Open columns and transfer cards in sequence to the four stacks. It's not as easy as it sounds!

name: Spotlight
description: In the darkness of a cold labyrinth, a lone spotlight guides you on your quest for lost treasure. You must find the treasure before your enemies. Use the power-ups hidden in the maze to defeat your opponents and retrieve the fortune to win!

name: Stick Tennis
description: Stick Tennis comes to IFE! Chip and charge as you beat top seeds in fast tempo tennis matches. Serve aces; drop volley and display exemplary footwork while working for an advantage. Rally up for game point!

name: Stop Those Aliens!
description: An alien fleet intent on destroying us has landed on our planet. It is your job to thwart the invasion by strategically placing towers on their route towards our base. Use the money you've earned and plant special towers with unique abilities to eliminate the enemy threat!

name: Poker Club: Gold Edition
description: The ultimate experience of the most immersive poker simulation ever made.

name: Construction Simulator: Spaceport Bundle
description:
If you had to choose between mighty excavators and speedy rockets, what would you pick? Exactly, both of them with the Construction Simulator – Spaceport Bundle!
This special edition features the Construction Simulator base game and the Spaceport Expansion. It’s the perfect choice for everyone who wants to enhance their construction business with fun space-theme projects.

name: Natural Craft
description: A funny Blocks Puzzle game.

name: A Army Base
description: 2D side-scrolling shooting, 5-player local cooperative combat, base defense, zombie survival, firearms, melee weapons, vehicles, and mechs.

name: Bit Addiction
description: Bit Addiction is a nonogram puzzle game that allows players to create and upload their own puzzles and share them with friends.

name: Lasso Catch
description: Lasso Catch is a small and simple retro-inspired arcade game where you have to catch the cows with your lasso while also avoiding the wolves. How many can you catch?

name: I Love Finding Furbabies: Collector's Edition
description: Collect cute furry creatures!

name: Santa's World
description: A family friendly Christmas platformer

name: Arcade Archives: Warp & Warp
description:
"WARP & WARP" is an action game released by NAMCO (Bandai Namco Entertainment Inc.) in 1981.
Players travel between two worlds as they progress: a space world where they fight with guns, and a maze world where they fight with time bombs.
Try for a high score by taking down the MYSTERY BEM that spawn under set conditions, or by taking out multiple enemies with a single explosion!

name: Tales of Three Kingdoms: The Mortal World
description: Dou Fu, who has always tried to live a low-key life in the chaotic period, gets involved in different events after meeting the “Princess” from the Han Dynasty. The choices he makes will lead them to different endings…

name: Keep Up
description: 3D Low-Poly Perma-Death platformer that will test the limits of your perseverance in a world of minimalistic beauty.

name: Synthetic Fantasy;
description: A "Visual Novel Play" about the nature of love and relationships! Caught between his fiance and an android, Dan Garland must make a choice that will change lives forever.

name: OG Puzzlers: Kira Maus
description: OG Puzzlers: Kira Maus is an casual puzzel game with cute dog images. You have to assemble a single image from random generated indivdual pieces. Combine all of the smart singel frames into one big image and unlock the next level.

name: Dungeon 3D: Eastern
description: The Eastern Theme pack contains over 100 new assets to build a glorious Eastern village, city, temple, or cultural battle scene. It contains a multitude of fun new props to really make your worlds come to life, built to work seamlessly together in Dungeon 3D!

name: Four Hunters Survivor
description: Play with four hunters to defeat and survive several hordes of countless enemies, improve your characters to survive more and more and become the most powerful hunter in the world.

name: Euro Truck Simulator 2: DAF XD
description: The DAF XD truck represents a new generation of distribution and vocational vehicles. From its aerodynamic features enhancing fuel efficiency to the advanced safety systems ensuring a secure journey, it is the ideal choice for your next regional delivery on the road.

name: Model Builder: Alaskan Road Truckers
description: Get ready to hit the rugged Alaskan wilderness in the Model Builder! With the Alaskan Road Truckers DLC we are expending already existing collection of models and giving you the possibility to recreate your favorite trucks! Customize them with unique modifications, colors or decals!

name: Train Sim World 4: RhB Arosa Aggregates Pack
description: Passenger & freight combine with Rivet Games' RhB Arosa Aggregates pack, all-new Swiss stone-laden services will be yours to master. The Fac wagon and 2 new Ge 4/4 II liveries bring the Aggregate terminal on Arosalinie to life in Train Sim World 4.

name: Fire Fly
description: It's an intense,adrenaline-pumping zombie mowing game where youll overcome many odds to find a cure.The game is not finished yet,and I will do my best to complete this game in the future,learn from the feedback,increase the gameplay,and make sure that it does not disappoint each and every one of you

name: Thunderblade Saga
description: "Thunderblade Saga" is a 2D side-scrolling action game featuring a rich array of combos and unique skill builds. Come challenge the distinctively unique bosses, unlock powerful skills, and enjoy an intense and thrilling combat journey!

name: From Space: Operation Clear Skies
description: This DLC provides additional content for Story Mode. During this expedition, you'll find immersive new characters that will provide you with dangerous tasks.

name: Flashing Lights: Thunder Sport Sedan Pack (Police, Fire, EMS)
description: Expand your police, fire and EMS garages even further with the Flashing Lights Thunder Sport Sedan Pack!

name: Rogue Survivalist
description: Choose Knight, Mage, or Rogue. Face enemies on 6 maps, level up, unlock unique abilities, and become a hero in this thrilling action RPG.

name: Inverse Ninjas vs. The Public Domain
description: Fight off increasingly powerful ninjas as some of the most iconic characters of all time in this 2-4 player party game!

name: Profound
description: A quirky action RPG made by only one person. Collect gold & loot. Upgrade weapons and armor. Kill enemies and level up your skills.

name: Mai In The Mysterious Castle
description: Mai In The Mysterious Castle is a third-person adventure, dark atmospheric puzzle game

name: Hentai Girls Slide
description: Hentai Girls Slide is a slide puzzle solving game. calm and relaxing moments. Enjoy calm and relaxing moments while solving slide puzzles with beautiful girls.

name: This Is How U Look Saying This Shit
description: This Is How U Look Saying This Shit is a mod for Friday Night Funkin' by phantasmuh that is based on the Boykisser meme.

name: MetroSim: The Subway Simulator
description: Explore Warsaw Metro in "MetroSim: The Subway Simulator." Drive trains, control tickets, and enjoy multiplayer realism. Rise through ranks, face challenges, and dive into the subway adventure now!

name: Konkwest
description: Konkwest is a globe based, arcade grand strategy game. In one evening, you (and your friends) can play through a world conquest campaign. Many historical starting scenarios bring you into the game world and let you bring your empire to glory. The single-resource economy lets the game appeal to casual players too.

name: Space Garbage
description: Do you like Tetris? Doesn't matter. Space Garbage is here to rotate Tetris 90 degrees on its head and add a little car to it. Blast and stack your way to the top of the leaderboard with this farm-to-table, indie, retro, solo, arcade... experience!

name: Christmas Clash
description: Help Santa claus and his christmas elfs to stop the angry babies, toddlers, and kids. Use strategy and management to secure the road to the workshop.

name: Auto Auto: Maximum Autodrive In The Alien Apocalypse
description: Oh no! Aliens have taken over! All of humanity is a hive mind with one goal... to destroy the last person standing! Drive, drift, and shoot your way through the onslaught before the aliens decide to deal with their little problem themselves. How long will your spirit keep the last person alive?

name: System Override
description: System Override is a first-person, single player heist game where you play as a hacker clearing a route through a variety of traps that block the way of your non-playable companion on the field.

name: Inari
description: Descend from the heavens and slay the evil spirits plaguing Japan in INARI, a side-scrolling hack-and-slash inspired by Japanese folklore. Slice your way through wicked yokai as you run across rooftops, through crowded festival streets, and make your way to the leader of the demonic parade.

name: Wizard's Beard
description: Explore locations, fight enemies, cast spells, and repeat! What more could you want in a game?

name: Sofi Origins
description: Sofi Origins is an adventure, suspense, and horror game in which you play as Sofi, a girl with a very sad past, but who in her world has powers. Alongside Sofi, you will experience fear and sadness in a unique way. You will have to use your skills and stay focused to confront the past.

name: Sympathia
description: 『Dodge × Beat』 Enjoy the world of sympathia in rhythm!

name: The Wizard Party
description: The Wizard Party is a whimsical adventure game where all dialogue options are physics objects that interact with each other!

name: Magnavody
description: Experience the magic and weirdness of the world's first home video console, the Magnavox Odyssey, lovingly recreated for modern hardware.

name: Rivals' Duel
description: Act fast, duels are fierce. Opponents will not wait a second to defeat you, accelerate your mind and face them with your swords and guns

name: Sick
description: Embark on a chilling journey that blurs the lines between reality and illusion and a mystery shrouded in darkness. Featuring beautiful pixel art, a bespoke soundtrack and a story that will leave you ... sick.

name: The Last Catalyst
description: Delve into this real-time roguelike deckbuilder mixed with an auto-battler. Find powerful synergies, improve your spells, collect artifacts and skills, and climb your way through swarms of enemies until you face the final boss!

name: Undead Mayhem
description: Undead Mayhem is a survival horror fps game where you will try to survive for as long as possible while fighting waves of bloodthirsty monsters coming to kill you!

name: Six Orders
description: A retro turn-based tactics game where you have to find the one simulation to save the earth from its impending death. Control your army of robots to fight TERRAs on their mission to destroy the last remaining chance of terrestrial life.

name: Gombo
description: Explore, build, fight and survive in an enchanting cartoon world! Take control of Gombo, your very own animated character, and adventure through a beautiful, yet unforgiving world full of dangers and surprises.

name: Hannah VCR
description: Solve the mysteries that are locked within Hannah's videotapes by changing the order and color of obstacles inside a retro videogame.

name: Star Deck
description: Explore the galaxy in Star Deck, a deckuilding sci-fi roguelite RPG! Rescue your brother from the Federation, an uncompromising totalitarian presence that rules the galaxy with an iron fist.

name: Bubble Chicken Farm
description: Bubble Chicken Farm offers an immersive game experience where adventure, farm management, and magic merge to create a world full of possibilities. Discover the joy of being a pirate farmer and create your own legend at Bubble Chicken Farm.

description: Collect Gems, explore worlds, and party hardy. You’ll do it all in Fimbul’s Gemboree- a fast-paced adventure platformer. Play as Fimbul, a little ice dragon, and help him run, jump, and roll across lands to collect items that will let him into the best party on the block.

name: Undertale: Mad Mew Mew Port
description: Undertale: Mad Mew Mew Port is an Undertale fangame by DeadDuck. The game is a recreation of the Mad Mew Mew boss battle from the Nintendo Switch version of Undertale, making it playable on both PC and Android.

description: The ‘New Frontiers’ DLC for Terraformers adds the option to found outposts on other celestial bodies in the Solar System. Explore the dangerous atmosphere of Venus, adapt to the massive gravity field of Jupiter or research the mysterious rings of Saturn.

name: Class of Heroes 2G: Remastered Edition
description: Are you ready to take on dark winding dungeons crawling with magic and monsters? Prepare yourself for a remastered classic dungeon crawler, full of exploration, combat, and endless opportunities.

name: Where the Music Dies: Mirror of Regret

name: Lasy Legacy: Null Space
description:
Last Legacy is a side-scrolling, platformer-puzzle game series for PC currently with 2 installments. You play as an adventurer with a magical terraforming ability where you can manipulate the environment around you as you explore new areas, battle enemies, and discover secrets.
Released for free in flash player summer 2014, Last Legacy: Null Space is the 2nd game under the Last Legacy series. Your character falls into a wormhole and finds himself in a mysterious universe called the Null Space, and visits 15 alternate dimensions on his way to get back to his own dimension. This game introduces upgradeable equipment and offers an optional hard version of each level.

description: Rock Band 2 Deluxe is an improvement mod for Rock Band 2, which enhances the look of the game and adds various quality-of-life upgrades.

name: Virtualis World
description:
Virtualis is a new Play-to-Earn game where people can work in buildings as employees and earn USDT working, playing the game with PvP Battles, selling on Marketplace their NFTs and much more.

In the world of virtualis there are different cities with different structures. You will be able to choose your departure city upon your first log in, but you will still be able to navigate between them very easily.

description: Sudoku is an addictive puzzle the world over! A grid divided into nine 3x3 boxes have a few numbers inserted to begin with. Fill the empty spaces so that the numbers 1-9 appear only once in each row, column and 3x3 box.

name: Topplz
description: Go through a collection of fun and challenging levels in this ever addictive physics game. Go hurtling through the air and bounce off the trampolines to bring down all the standing blocks, and collect trophies in each level!

Gnomes Garden 5: Halloween
Gnomes Garden 7: Christmas Story
Lost Artifacts: Frozen Queen

name: She's My Destined Fiancee?!
description:
When you were just seven years old, a summer vacation on a remote Japanese island led to a promise—a promise to marry a girl someday. But life in the bustling city pulled you away. Now, as a high school student with a heart set on the class president, your life seems promising. However, that distant promise catches up with you when the island beauty transfers to your school and announces herself as your fiancée!

Your peaceful high school life is thrown into chaos, and you're torn between your past and your heart. Having a fiancée doesn't seem to deter your best friend and crush. If anything, their obvious jealousy brings them closer to you than ever. With all three girls vying for your attention, will you honor your childhood promise or let your heart decide your destiny?
