description: Fly high and try to stick the landing. How far can you jump?

name: Tennis Tournament Hyper-Casual
description: Immerse yourself in the exciting world of our competitions, where precious trophies - cups - are at stake! Exciting tournaments consisting of three intense matches await you.

name: Survive to Live!
description: This is a casual game that combines tower defense and survival, constantly gaining strength in a tidal wave of monsters. Combine tower defense trap river players to swim and survive.

name: Sling Puzzle: Golf Master
description: Have you ever imagined what happens to the world when gravity is not always downward? In an inverted city, you will walk over walls and fall into the sky. In the game, you will explore in the intricate gravity space, break the traps, solve the puzzles, and discover the path to the end.

name: Planet Suika
description: Take your Suika stacking skills to a new planetary level in this Casual Puzzle Game! Combine smaller planets together to turn them into larger planets. Master the games Physics to combine the planets until you make a big Sun!

name: Warzone Chronicles: Battlegrounds
description: Experience relentless multiplayer warfare in Warzone Chronicles: Battlegrounds. Choose diverse arenas, customize settings, and engage in strategic battles solo or with friends. Optional Perspectacles enhance immersion. Join the frontline, dominate in this epic FPS adventure.

name: FishTDX
description: Buy towers to defend your islands against waves of fish! Unlock new towers after each round with new play styles and new synergies. Build your defenses to annihilate the fish with hours and hours of incredibly satisfying and addictive gameplay!

name: Vigaro Runner
description: Player is Vigaro pill and his mission is to avoid traps and use platforms to find star and finish levels

name: Cave Dweller
description: You wake up in the depths of a cave. Can you unravel all the mysteries of this place and find a way to freedom? This is an adventure where every decision could be the key to success.

name: Sweet Home: Look and Find - Collector's Edition
description: Immerse yourself in the comfort and tranquility of home as you relax and enjoy finding objects, solving puzzles, and conquering mini-games in this cozy and clever new hidden object game from Avi Games!

name: Cat Sandbox
description: Save pixel cats in this physics puzzle game!

name: Myth of Future Dimension
description: A real-time strategy game that abandons complicated operations and pursues lightheartedness.Tells a story that............ is not easy to summarize or describe......Experience the cultivation of armaments with a "high degree of freedom".

name: Nightscape City
description: Nightscape City is nightclub management simulation. Manage your nightclub, buy new music, unlock new drinks, grow your empire!

name: Doomsday Beans
description: Doomsday Bean is an arcade game in the Bullet Hell genre. The player controls an armed car. You have several types of main weapons to choose from.

name: Deckbuilder Fantasy
description: Embark on a thrilling deckbuilding adventure! Craft your strategy as you explore treacherous lands and face challenging foes. Discover a vast array of powerful cards and unique treasures, fighting your way to the final boss on a journey that's different every time.

name: Hexburg
description: Hexburg allows you to create a thriving medieval hexagonal grid based metropolis full of industry, trade, culture, and more!

name: Aim Trainer: Shooting Range
description: Aim Trainer - Shooting Range is a casual shooting game that includes a variety of exciting and fun game modes and a extensive weapon upgrade system. Train your shooting skills, collect different types of weapons, and become an excellent shooter elite!

name: I Still Live Under Your House
description: You're a horrible monster living under someone's house.

name: Peasant Royale
description: Meet the first standalone medieval battle royale game! Take part in battles with up to 50 players using a wide variety of weapons and other items.

name: Emi: Christmas Special
description: Emi and our Protagonist find themselves on the naughty list this year! Follow their holiday escapades as they earn their way back into Santa's good graces.

name: Lunar's Chosen: Episode 2
description: Lunar's chosen introduced a world of magic, danger, romance and sex. With a whole host of changes and improvements, animations and HD renders, the story continues in Lunar's Chosen Episode 2!

name: Retro Abyss: Last Wish of the Game
description: The past and the future, a dream and a memory, the abyss and the surface, casual and hardcore... this game is an action game that resides in-between.

name: Purrfectly Hidden Cats: Kittenbay
description: Explore 'Purrfectly Hidden Cats - Kittenbay', where elusive felines await discovery in a day-and-night adventure. Find hidden cats, interact with locals, and unveil the charming secrets of Kittenbay!

name: Little Chefs: Co-op
description: Call up your friends and dive into the world of culinary madness where you get to be Little Chefs! Cook dishes, customize and improve your kitchen with the building system, upgrade your character, complete missions and remember: nothing without teamwork, speed and a pinch of madness!

name: Champion of Venus: Tayla's Big Adventure
description: Join Tayla on her biggest, bustiest adventure so far! Unravel a conspiracy of gods and monsters, square off with the most lustful Champions in existence, and uncover the stadium's mysteries!Like, totally!

name: Twizzle Puzzle: Cats
description: Twizzle Puzzle: Cats - is the perfect puzzle game for a fun and rewarding pastime.

name: Yoko
description: Yoko offers a terrifying first-person psychological horror experience. Unravel the sinister mysteries of Saikominami, where spirits impede your exploration, immersing yourself in an immersive journey filled with suspense and horror.

name: Cat Palette: Merging Colorful Kittens
description: In this 2D puzzle game you have to mix different colored cats together. "Cat Palette: Merging Colorful Kittens" has 150 handcrafted levels with tons of different and unique fluffy friends!

name: Whispering Paws
description: Embark on a poignant journey with Whispering Paws, a 3D adventure where you guide a determined fox to reunite its family. Explore enchanting landscapes, solve puzzles, and immerse yourself in a heartfelt narrative. Discover the magic within nature's embrace.

name: Relieve
description: "Relieve" is a hand-drawn comic style narrative puzzle visual novel with unique art and high-quality music. It allows you to experience the story of a couple's separation and reunion from different perspectives.

name: Pru the Pigeon
description: Pru the Pigeon is a bite-sized 3D platformer with precise and expressive controls. Join Pru on adventures through charming levels, collecting various items for a nostalgic, fun-filled experience!

name: Nafanya the Poltergeist
description: A game about a house spirit - Houseboy. With the name Nafanya. The player will have to get out of a multi-unit Soviet house, which is run by the Domovoi. To find the way out, you will have to solve riddles from the spirit, and maybe even make friends with him.

name: Buried Shards
description: Get Inmersed in the intriguing narrative adventure of Buried Shards, progressing through the story chapters while alternating between day and night. Guide your sleepwalking self with house lights during the night and confront the traumas of your past in this unique blend of storytelling and puzzles.

name: Chasm Crawl
description: Chasm Crawl is a first person action adventure game, filled with dangerous dungeons and even strange monsters. A mist in The Land of Monsters has turned its inhabitants into hostile creatures that will attack on-site. Level up and maintain resources to discover what lies in The Chasm.

name: Bear It
description: Can you handle this un-bear-able fast-paced FPS? Bear It is a highly replayable roguelite parkour movement shooter for agile players. Use parkour on the environment and even on your enemies to traverse the Ark’s platforms quickly and efficiently. Be prepared for the unexpected!

name: Celestial Return
description: Celestial Return is a narrative driven Sci-Fi Noir RPG where you roll as 3 lost souls scheming the Heist of the Millennia. Roll the dice, mix and match your skills, make tough choices, and steal the "Titan Core" to rule a cyborg army!

name: Walpurgis Raid
description: Prepare yourself for Roguelite bullet-hell battles! Dive into a magic world to sets out on the royal battle. Upgrade your witch and transform into an unstoppable force, obliterating enemies in epic combat showdowns. Brace yourself for a survival match like no other!

name: Skyline Sprint: Turbo Tracks
description: Race through the skies, master aerial stunts, and unlock cars in Skyline Sprint: Turbo Tracks. Collect stars, conquer levels, and enhance immersion with optional Perspectacles head tracking glasses. Become the champion of high-speed, airborne racing! Pick a car and give it a Go!

name: Space Accident VR
description: Step into the future with our groundbreaking VR game set in the year 2119, where humanity embarks on a historic journey into space. Join the "CCM-1" (Callisto Colonization Mission) expedition, aimed at the enigmatic moon of Jupiter - Callisto.

name: Jrago II: Guardians of Eden
description: Jrago II Guardians of Eden is a Multiplayer Co-Op METROIDVANIA style 2D Platforming Action-Adventure Role Playing Game. The darkness has once again returned, and this time Jrago teams up with his fellow guardians as they slay the evil demons and bring back the light!

name: Nightbeast VR
description: Nightbeast is a VR shooter where players enter the criminal underworld, becoming skilled marksmen, and boldly confronting ruthless foes as they complete contracts and deliver justice.

name: Hieroglyph Quest: The Amarna Enigma
description: Start learning Ancient Egyptian Hieroglyphics now with this introductionary role playing game based on actual events from roughly 3500 years ago!

name: Solo
description: SoLo is a Sci-Fi third person shooter set on a hostile desert planet. Recruited to fight alongside an alien studying the planet, you must battle with a race of interplanetary poachers that are plundering the wildlife and natural resources

name: Deadville
description: In Deadville, players must face their deepest fears, rely on their survival instincts, and make tough decisions to outlast the apocalypse. Only the most resourceful, cunning, and resilient survivors stand a chance against the relentless zombie horde.

name: Dark and Evil
description: Dark & Evil is an Open World Action RPG game where players take on the role of a young and inexperienced Dark Lord. Fresh from a humbling defeat at the hands of humanity, the Dark Lord is fueled by the burning desire to conquer the human world and reclaim his rightful throne.

name: Kinstrife
description: Medieval RPG with revolutionary physics-based combat & strategic campaign. Become a wandering knight in a quest for fortune & glory, as you fight in duels, battles & tournaments. Build your wealth, equipment & following - and carve out your destiny in a realm of warring great houses and petty lords.

name: Mind Palace
description: Explore your own notes in this experimental VR journey. Climb, jump & slide along the way on your adventure of buildung your personal mind palace. Make connections and place node-bubbles to arrange your notes in memorable places.

name: Element Fighters
description: Element Fighters is the only third person multiplayer Arena-Shooter where you fight against players around the world using the four elements: Air, Earth, Water and Fire. Chose your nation and decide your destiny!

name: Dandelion Planet
description: A heartwarming atmosphere,SF novel adventure game. Let's relax on another planet! You enjoy going to different places, interacting with space people, and trying part-time jobs.

name: We Need More Guns
description: Team up in 'We Need More Guns,' a 4-player co-op wave shooter with procedurally generated weapons. Dive into the heart of chaos as you and your friends face relentless waves.

name: In Darkness We Hide
description: In Darkness We Hide is a multiplayer hide an seek game where you try to hide in the dark to avoid the hunters but stay in the light to prevent yourself from going insane.

name: Fire Guardian
description: A platform adventure game. Explore various scenarios, lute against mercenaries, drones. Feed the animals.

name: Crying Alone
description: Dive into 'Crying Alone', a 20-minute narrative-driven game that reflects my personal journey through heartbreak and healing. Experience the raw emotions of loss, the struggle for acceptance, and the first steps towards recovery in this poignant story.

name: Idle Plant Game
description: Idle Plant Game, an idle and offline progress or clicker plant simulation!

name: Miss Neko: Pirates
description: Pirates ahead! The pirate girls on Skull Island have yet to witness the true extent of your prowess, Captain. Can you conquer them one by one with your skills and plunder that precious treasure onto your ship?

name: Hide or Sex
description: “Hide or Sex” In our new game, you must be ready to survive the love that your adventure companions want to give you. With awesome 2D animation, this is a must play!

name: Apex Rush
description: Race, Drift & Stunt in this physics-based arcade racing game! Build and share your own tracks with the world and top the leaderboards!

name: SnowRunner: Jack of All Treads Tire Pack
description: You can customize your SnowRunner experience further with the Jack of All Treads Tire Pack, adding over 50 unique tire & rim combinations for your whole fleet!

name: SnowRunner: Kenworth W990
description: Expand your SnowRunner garage with the 2023 Kenworth W990! This Heavy-class truck brings superior on-road capabilities thanks to its retractable axle and superior fuel capacity. The Kenworth W990 is not included in the Year 1, Year 2 or Year 3 Pass.

name: All Elite Wrestling: Fight Forever - Dynamite featuring The Acclaimed
description: The boldest Tag Team in AEW history, Anthony Bowens and Max Caster of The Acclaimed, PLUS the brand new Dynamite themed arena kick off AEW: Fight Forever's Season 2 DLC series.

name: Asteroid Core
description: You are isolated on a small meteor and need to build a fire to escape before being destroyed by aliens. Use your limited space to create machines and obtain more and more resources. Enjoy this mix of puzzles, tower defense and incremental gameplay.

name: Forza Motorsport 2019: McLaren #03 720S GT3
description: Forza Motorsport 2019 McLaren #03 720S GT3

name: 52Hertz
description: You, who's had enough of getting old with nothing accomplishedIt's been completely destroyed by an incidentWe head to the coastal island village [Mangyeongdo] which is famous for its suicide attraction.

name: Naiko's Room
description:
"The handless clock may shatter, but it will never stop ticking."

Naiko's Room is an RPG Maker psychological horror game about a monotonous life, a priceless purpose and an old, rotten friendship. A guiding light for the abandoned, a Room where the past, present and future will collide until The End of all.

Follow an introverted girl who ends up in a room with no door, as she does her daily routine. Read books, experience nightmares and find flower scented memories in a journey to gather the will to get out.

But remember, there's someone out there waiting for you outside...

name: Sid Meier's Civilization VI: Porfirio Diaz Pack
description:
A mod that adds the Mexican civilization with its Leader Porfírio Diaz.
Playing as him gives you:

- Unique improvement (Panteón Civil)
- Unique units (Chinaco & Guardia Real)
- Unique Agenda (Less Politics, More Administration)
- Adds Diego Rivera as an Industrial Era Great Artist
- Replaces the Mexico City State with San Antonio for historical reasons
- And much more!

name: Compact Cyber Arcade: Ultimate Spider-Man
description: A Handheld game system based on the TV series Ultimate Spider-Man.

name: Lucid Night
description: Sin descripción

name: Quaternion
description: Quaternion is a total-conversion modification of the game Marble Blast Gold, which is a ball-rolling platform game released in 2003. Quaternion puts a new spin on the game, adding a central hub level and more puzzle-oriented gameplay, as well as modernized graphics and physics.

name: GI King!: Sanbiki no Yosouya
description: GI King!: Sanbiki no Yosouya is a Sports game, developed by Graphic Research and published by Vic Tokai, which was released in Japan in 1993.

name: Cyberpunk 2077: Ultimate Edition
description:
Cyberpunk 2077: Ultimate Edition is an open-world RPG containing two powerful adventures: the base game of Cyberpunk 2077, taking place in the dark future of Night City, and Phantom Liberty, a spy-thriller story set in the walled-off district of Dogtown. Players take on the role of V, a cyber-enhanced mercenary, and embark on a fight for survival filled with story-defining decisions, action-packed gameplay, and unforgettable characters, including rockerboy Johnny Silverhand (played by Keanu Reeves) and FIA sleeper agent Solomon Reed (played by Idris Elba).

This new release is the perfect way to experience every story of the dark future; it also contains the free Update 2.0, which overhauled many of the game’s systems, introducing dynamic skill trees, high-octane vehicle combat, and enhanced enemy and police AI — as well as adding new weapons, vehicles, and clothes. The release is bolstered with a set of previously released digital goodies available as part of the “My Rewards” program, available to all who register.

name: StrayShot
description:
StrayShot is a thrilling free-to-play third-person shooter game where you step into the boots of a Bounty Hunter, and take on rivals in intense matches in several game modes.
Team up with friends or go solo to fight other players in an epic battle for survival and earn exclusive rewards.

name: Counter-Strike Anthology
description:
The original version of the #1 online action game in the world offers an action experience of incredible depth and realism. This Anthology also includes a collection of single player CS games and the official CS bot for skirmish play.

Includes: Counter-Strike, Counter-Strike: Condition Zero, Day of Defeat, Deathmatch Classic, Ricochet

name: 5 Nights at Hoax Freddy's
description: 5 Nights at Hoax Freddy's is a fan made FNaF game. The game is about fake/hoax characters in FNaF 1

name: Lollihop
description: Jump into the vibrant VR world of Lollihop - a tasty third-person platformer! Guide a playful platypus with a large lollipop through colorful realms, mastering precise jumps and collecting juicy fruits in immersive stereoscopic vision.

name: Sisyphus Paradox
description: Sisyphus Paradox is a fusion of roguelike tactical elements with classic side-scrolling shoot 'em up gameplay. Explore and fight your way across the galaxy as you try to get back home to Earth in this hand drawn indie game.

name: Grandfather Simulator
description: Open the door to Grandfather's life! Watch TV series, play with the dog, argue with your wife, take pills, eat lunch, sleep, go for a walk. Live the measured life of a grandfather, where every day is an adventure, and routine is an art!

name: Neon River
description: Long distances into future there is nothing left to have but one thing: fun. Endless battles in endlessly generated worlds is the only thing you will find in this arcade-inspired rouguelike action bullet hell. Fight your way through, live as much as you can or just have fun, die and restart.

name: Your Shots Count
description: Defeat monsters, protect your village and practice your math skills in Your Shots Count. There's strength in numbers, and you defeat the three different types of enemies by shooting at the correct answer to the math expression above them.

name: Astral Divide
description: You wakeup alone in a damaged spaceship. With no memories and only radio communications with HQ, you will have to investigate what is going on here. But survival comes first: gather resources, build a spaceship out of gear and steam and explore hand-crafted planets with unique biomes and resources.

name: My Time at Sandrock: Summer Heat Collection 1
description: Travel to the desert community of Sandrock and take on the role of a fledgling Builder. Use your trusty toolset to gather resources, construct machines, and turn your run-down workshop into a well-oiled production facility to save the town from the jaws of economic ruin!

name: My Time at Sandrock: Summer Heat Collection 2
description: Travel to the desert community of Sandrock and take on the role of a fledgling Builder. Use your trusty toolset to gather resources, construct machines, and turn your run-down workshop into a well-oiled production facility to save the town from the jaws of economic ruin!

name: My Time at Sandrock: Summer Heat Collection 3
description: Travel to the desert community of Sandrock and take on the role of a fledgling Builder. Use your trusty toolset to gather resources, construct machines, and turn your run-down workshop into a well-oiled production facility to save the town from the jaws of economic ruin!

name: My Time at Sandrock: Starlight Collection 3
description: A starlight costume collection with outfits for Nia, Unsuur, Amirah, and Owen in 4 colors for each character. Each outfit contains a hat, top, bottoms, shoes, and 3 additional accessories.

name: My Time at Sandrock: Starlight Collection 2
description: A starlight costume collection with outfits for Fang, Catori, Ernest, and Mi-an in 4 colors for each character. Each outfit contains a hat, top, bottoms, shoes, and 3 additional accessories.

name: My Time at Sandrock: Starlight Collection 1
description: A starlight costume collection with outfits for Logan, Grace, Elsie, and Qi in 4 colors for each character. Each outfit contains a hat, top, bottoms, shoes, and 3 additional accessories.

name: The Witches Pond
description: The Witches Pond is a horror-adventure game based on the real-life place with the same name. Enter a world of mystery and strange places where you will experience events that may or may not seem real.

name: Surviving with a Bat
description: Surviving with a Bat is an open world game with endless waves of zombies. Your only weapon is a baseball bat.

name: Hrumka
description: A rogue-like battler on a match-3 board. Match gems to attack enemies, avoid damage and gather collectibles. Use your level-up upgrades to become stronger and try different play styles. Be careful though - enemies can also level up!

name: Hidden World 10 Top-Down 3D
description: Find the objects that are hidden on the map.

name: Hidden Western Top-Down 3D
description: Find the objects that are hidden on the map.

name: Five Nights at Backrooms: Waifu Edition
description: Welcome to Backrooms, to a previously unknown level. The Backrooms are inhabited by special entities that look cute, but when you get close to them, they'll do anything to kill you. Their peculiarity is that they move only at night. Yes, on this level Backrooms has a day and night shift.

name: Space Rocks!
description: Game is tribute to the classic Atari 1979 arcade game in which player tries to survive through waves of various obstacles and enemies. How long can you survive?

name: Ride 5: Dreamer's Garage Pack
description: Collect the bikes everyone wants with Ride 5: Dreamer's Garage Pack and ride the Nevada track's most breathtaking views!

name: Hot Wheels Unleashed 2: Turbocharged - Manga Free Pack
description: Directly from the Japanese comics comes an exaggerated duo of vehicles all wings and spoilers! The overpowered speedster Mad Manga and the roadster version Track Manga are ready for crazy rides and oversized fun!

name: UltraNothing
description: Nothing to See Here... 2d Puzzle Strategy (not RPG) Platformer.

name: Send It: The Game
description: An Action meets Puzzle meets Milsim game. You aim the mortar, you shoot the mortar. You follow the mortar to its target, and use various upgrades to do so, including Plummeting shot, Precision Shot, Glide bombs, autocannons, cluster bombs, and more! Did you miss? Adjust the angle!

name: Happy Color Links
description: An adorable sokoban puzzle game , where you push blocks from the same color to link them together and make them happy.

name: Elven Dreams
description: Welcome to this elven-infused world, where you'll be free to capture the elves you want, control them into battle, level them up and evolve, and finally fuse into that unique "strongest elven"!

name: HunterX: Code Name T
description: HunterX: Code Name T is an action adventure with fast and stylish combat. Perfect your own fighting style using various weapon actions and magic, and explore an ever-greater world.

name: Scavenger VR
description: An unknown crack resembling the Mesozoic Era discovered in the near future. Collect dinosaur eggs while avoiding the eyes of dangerous dinosaurs. Collect dinosaur eggs and hatch them to collect dinosaurs!! Collect points to get upgraded and enjoy a great vacation!!

name: Simulator Z
description: A world where you can create your own zombie apocalypse to your liking!

name: Cats Huddled Together
description: There are many cats here, come and take a look!

name: Space Papers: Planet's Border
description: Attention, Earthwad! Welcome to Nations United by Convenience, the NUC. You have just called up for a great mission on Earth as an intergalactic border patrol officer!

name: Mom Simulator 2023
description: Discover the beauty in the daily chaos of motherhood. Cook, clean, nurture, and thrive in a world of endless love and challenges.

name: Sensual Adventures: Episode 9
description: Trinity meets Alexandra for the first time!

name: VR Waifu: MuChan
description: Not frustrating control, Not long tutorial, Not lost Willy anywhere. Because Willy is in your hands..."VR Waifu" is easy to play!

name: Echelon
description: Sin descripción

name: EVE Vanguard
description: EVE Vanguard is an MMOFPS set in the deep, persistent, far-future universe of New Eden. As an elite mercenary whose ground operations directly influence the massive player-driven conflicts taking place in space above, every deployment, resource gathered, and battle fought will contribute to the ever-evolving war and narrative of New Eden.

name: Ant Farm Simulator
description: Ant farm (formicarium) with a colony of ants. Ants have artificial intelligence that mimics the full life cycle, behavior, nature and physics of real insects.

name: Jurassic World Evolution 2: Cretaceous Predator Pack
description: Introduce four ferocious new predators to your parks with Jurassic World Evolution 2: Cretaceous Predator Pack. Manage and control these striking dinosaurs as they fight for dominance in your parks and search for their next meal.

name: Corvid's Night
description:
Rumina the Bloodwolf has retired from her days as a notorious mercenary to live a peaceful life with her wife, a former nun named Ophelia. That is, until she finds Ophelia missing, with only a note bearing the crest of House Corvid...

Corvid's Night is a survival horror dungeon crawler, with an art style and gameplay inspired by classics in the genre from the fifth console generation. Manage Rumina's vitality and the oil in her lamp, as you explore and fight grotesque monsters to uncover the mystery of Castle Corvid.

name: Echoes of Steel
description: A third-person shooter with melee and shooter enemies. Unlock ancient alien wisdom by shooting enemies in your way and reaching important boxes.

name: Rhythm Station
description: Shoot to the beat! Rhythm Station is a rhythm-based action roguelike set in space

name: Airborne Arena
description: Airborne Arena is a shooter-racing game set in 2058's Rider City. Enter an action-packed new reality filled with deadly hoverbike races, as you take the role of "The Prodigy" and infiltrate the different Viker gangs in the story mode or challenge your friends to online races and deathmatch arenas.

name: Diesel Burners
description: Diesel Burners is a fast-paced aerial shooter. Destroy hordes of enemies while collecting resources and power-ups. Buy, upgrade, and customize your character and planes; and put your skills to the test facing bosses in a variety of single-player and multiplayer modes!

name: SCP-087-B UE Remake
description: SCP-087-B UE Remake is a free single-player horror experience which seeks to recreate many aspects of the 2012 game SCP-087-B made by Joonas Rikkonen while keeping the charm and feel of the original.

name: Soul Knight Prequel
description: Soul Knight Prequel is a pixel-art action RPG featuring loot farming. Slash monsters to upgrade your power, or party up for treasure against the odds. Our newest ARPG continues to feature Soul Knight's familiar posse of chibi characters, while satiating the fans' hunger for more lore and quests!

name: Domenation
description: Survive the Pulse in Domenation's futuristic post-apocalyptic Bubble Royale. In this round-based multiplayer shooter, scavenge for gear and outlast rivals to become the ultimate survivor.

name: Shinsetsu Shiawase Usagi F: Yuujou Yori mo Aiyoku
description:
This installment of Shiawase Usagi abandons the heroines of the two previous games in favor of characters curiously named after Neon Genesis Evangelion heroes: the protagonist is called Shinji, the love interests Misato and Asuka, etc. The plot, however, has little to do with that of the anime series: the hero is a young man who is watching a porn movie and decides to get some real "action". Afterwards, it becomes a series of sexual encounters, which proceed depending on the player's choices.

Being a visual novel, the game can develop into different directions story-wise. The only gameplay consists of deciding where to go and/or what to do. Depending on the player's decisions, the story will be concluded with various endings, "happy" as well as "bad".

name: Triple
description: Clone of Tetris.

name: Baseball
description: Sin descripción

name: Access Block
description: A "match-3" puzzle game. Later re-published by Waixing; the Waixing version uses a rendition of Terriermon's theme from Digimon Battle Spirit.

name: Heli Mission
description: Clone of the Flash game Helicopter. An endless game where the player must guide the always-moving helicopter through obstacles. Some releases change the title to "Heli-Mission" (without the extra L); though in all releases, the high-score screen humorously spells "Name" as "NMAE". Later re-published by Waixing; the Waixing version uses a rendition of the "Tim 2" tune from Lemmings.

name: Twin Cards
description: Matching game with an increasing amount of cards as the game continues.

name: Play Dice
description: Sin descripción

name: Maze Puzzle
description: Sin descripción

name: Cat vs. Dog
description: Sin descripción

name: Mafia Thief
description: Mafia Thief is a third-person stealth game. Break in 6 unique missions into houses, mansions, a warehouse or a junkyard to steal more than 100 different items. Complete the missions and follow the exciting story. Avoid security guards, residents and the police. Get ready for the hardest thief experience of the year!

name: Five Nights at Freddys: 1993
description: Sin descripción

name: GTA Turk City
description: GTA Turk City (also known as GTA Türk) is a mod of GTA Vice City

name: The Legend of Zelda: Revival
description: A Majora's Mask romhack with a small world to explore.

name: Seraph: In the Darkness
description: Seraph: In the Darkness is a classic dark fantasy. It's an action role-playing game (ARPG) with hack-and-slash combat mechanics, allowing for item customization tailored to your playstyle. Experience new thrills in the world of SERAPH, where aesthetics of darkness and fear combine

name: Mydhia Online
description:
Welcome to the world of Mydhia Online, an MMORPG that brings back the nostalgia of the golden era of RPGs, inspired by classics like Final Fantasy and Chrono Trigger. With 16-bit pixelated graphics, the game captures the same retro vibe as hits like Stardew Valley.

Get ready for real-time combat against hundreds of enemies in a complex and engaging storyline. But remember, Mydhia Online isn't just about solo adventures. Socialization is the key to success in this game, with party, guild, and EXP-sharing systems among friends.

So, join us, Wanderer, and dive yourself into the vast universe of Mydhia.

name: Urban Smash
description: Urban Smash is an unreleased video game developed by Evolution Studios for the PlayStation 3. The game later was redeveloped into MotorStorm Apocalypse.

name: Space Beam
description: Top-down space shooter in which the player's and his opponent's spacecrafts are at the opposite sides of the screen. Both try to shoot their opponent first while moving left and right. Space debris is floating between both players and blocking the respective shots. Furthermore the energy level for the laser has to be filled to the max in order to reach the other side of the screen (and therefore your opponent).

name: Golf With Your Friends: Ultimate Edition
description: An easy hole in one for any Golf With Your Friends fan! Grab everything from hats to courses, and swing in style with this seriously decked out version.

name: Golf With Your Friends: Starter Edition
description: Tee yourself up for the perfect swing! Your first step into Golf With Your Friends has never looked so good!

name: Chico and the Magic Orchards DX

name: Metro Quester
description:
Metro Quester is a dungeon exploration RPG based in a post-apocalyptic futuristic world created by the manga artist Kazushi Hagiwara, with a deep game system desgined by Hironori Kato that offers the excitement and surprises reminiscent of 1980s computer games through hack and slash.

Featuring 24 characters and 8 classes, enjoyable combo skills, numerous customizable weapons, a bestiary, and features like NEW GAME+ for replayability, it offers plenty of depth for dedicated gamers.

name: Submarines
description: Submarines is a casual arcade-style game where players pilot a submarine through the ocean using intuitive thrust mechanics. Collect power-ups and weapons to navigate the levels, taking on enemy submarines and adversaries in a fun and engaging underwater experience.

name: Towers Watch
description: In a realm where magic and medieval warfare collide, embark on an epic journey to defend the kingdom of Eldoria in "Tower's Watch," a thrilling fantasy medieval tower defense game.

name: Hooligan Simulator 2023: You vs. System
description: In Hooligan Simulator, players are not subjected to trials but are presented with the audacious opportunity to express themselves through graffiti. Armed with the means to draw, you can assert your presence in society through free expression. By painting graffiti, vandalising public property, and leaving your mark, you become the embodiment of audacity. However, be aware that such actions make you a prime target for law enforcement.

name: Hell Galaxy
description: Hell Galaxy is the only game where you can experience the fusion of space battles, eerie specters, and daunting titans. This unique gameplay offers a mix of action, horror, and space exploration. Engage in dynamic mining, looting, and crafting while traversing an RPG-influenced cosmos.

name: Pixelment TD
description: Pixelment TD is an Element based Tower Defense game, You are facing a new tower defense game with unique graphic experience.

name: Contract Sudoku
description: Sudoku is a popular puzzle game around the world, in order to let more people like Sudoku, we developed this game. I believe it can accompany you for a long time.

name: Endless Glory
description: Lead your army to endless glory

name: Hentai: Nude Quest
description: Embark on an enchanting journey through the mystical realms of Hentai Nude Quest, a unique and visually captivating walking simulator that combines the allure of anime aesthetics with the tranquility of a lush forest.

name: Mortadelo y Filemón: Dos Vaqueros Chapuceros
description: Mort & Phil travel to the Wild West in this new adventure, thanks to Dr. Bacterio (naturally!).

name: Major Minor 2.0: (Re)Vision
description: Become intertwined in the fateful connection plaguing two worlds, bound together by a murder mystery, and a competition for the throne of a god. The award-winning visual novel, completely revamped! New script, new choices, and romance! Become The Savior today, and choose wisely...

name: Mortadelo y Filemón: Terror, Espanto y Pavor
description: Mort and Phil travel to the world of horror cinema in this adventure, thanks to Dr. Bacterio (of course!).

name: Paco El Hare vs Los Marcianos Siderales
description: A brief piece of history about Spanish software and video games.

name: KnifePlayground: Horror Battle Royale
description: Multiplayer Survival Horror: 4 Players Co-op or Solo Battle Royale. Players have to cooperate or kill each other in a 3 floors mansion full of monsters which every floor closes after a deadly countdown. Shoot, stab, hide, upgrade and get stronger after every death by unpredictable Roguelite elements

name: Mortadelo y Filemón: La Sexta Secta
description: Extended version of the merging of 'Operación Moscú' and 'El Escarabajo de Cleopatra,' with additional and alternative content.

name: Bug Riders
description: Leptus is dying, and the tournament is on to succeed him as the Emperor of Entymion. Enter the hi-resolution huve of insane insect racing and fly the unfriendly skies!

name: Super Dr Corona
description: Super Dr. Corona is a Super take on classic 3 match games with a familiar theme.

name: Supreme Ruler The Great War Remastered DLC
description: Real-Time Strategy/Wargame. BattleGoat Studios invites you to travel back to 1914 and select from more than 50 playable regions at the onset of World War I, as European powers struggle to survive and new technologies transform warfare.

name: Cute Cats Slide
description: I love cats, you love cats, who doesn't love cats. Have fun with this classic slide puzzle with lots of cute cats.

name: Supreme Ruler The Great War Remastered
description: Real-Time Strategy/Wargame. BattleGoat Studios invites you to travel back to 1914 and select from more than 50 playable regions at the onset of World War I, as European powers struggle to survive and new technologies transform warfare.

name: I Bring The Chaos
description: Embark on a relentless bullet heaven in I Bring The Chaos. Vanquish foes, level up and dial up the challenge to earn hefty EXP bonuses and coin rewards. Explore 3 unique worlds, delve into deep strategy and master your firepower. Become the ultimate harbinger of chaos!

name: Allogloom
description: Chaos has descended upon the town of Gruesome Grove and its fate rests in Nora’s hands. Join her on an oftentimes gory journey through a beautifully hand-drawn world. Discover forgotten truths, make peculiar friends, encounter monsters and solve puzzles in this mysterious and macabre adventure.

name: Problemlöser
description: Take control of the new IT trainee in this 2D action game and avoid collisions with the IT professionals. Debug scripts to find bugs to squeeze. More administrators are waiting for you in each level. Remember, your time is limited! If that sounds too easy, try 8 different difficulty levels.

name: TaxingTiles
description: Shape your realm. Conquer chaos. Unveil mysteries. Deck-building roguelike fun!

name: Rogue Knight
description: Experience fast-paced rogue-lite gameplay. Explore ever-changing locations and fight vicious enemies in souls-inspired 2d combat. Every run you will find variety of items and spells to compliment your playstyle, as well as resources to upgrade your town for future runs.

name: Fortune Rewritten: Costume Pack 1
description: A nice, small compact cosmetic bundle which features 4 brand new costumes that you can customize your player with!

name: Ship Graveyard Simulator 2: Warships DLC
description: Get ready for an unforgettable adventure in the world of ship demolition with Ship Graveyard Simulator 2: Warships DLC! Discover epic new warships, earn unique loot, hone your demolition skills, and become a legend in the demolition of warships.

name: Speak of the Devil I: A Deathly Proposition
description: Experience the impact of making a pact with a demon in this linear visual novel, where the consequences can be life-changing in an instant. Michi, the main character, has the chance to pursue a romantic relationship with any of the female characters, including the demon he made a deal with.

name: 36 Nights
description: 36 Nights is a tower defense game with roguelike and bullet heaven elements. Buy turrets and upgrade your survivor to defend against waves of zombies. You'll need careful strategy and a little luck if you want to survive 36 nights...

name: Cosmic Carnage: Prologue
description: Prepare for an interstellar showdown like no other in a gripping roguelike top-down twin-stick shooter set in the vast depths of space. Pilot your advanced starship, engaging in relentless battles against hordes of alien adversaries. Destroy, Collect, Upgrade, Die, Unlock, Repeat.

name: Onmyoudou Origins
description: Onmyoudou Origins is an action Rpg with elements of Japanese folklore.
